## Projection.scalePointToSurface() method

Scales the given world coordinates to the surface.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract scalePointToSurface(worldPoint: Vector3Like): Vector3Like;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  worldPoint | [Vector3Like](./harp-geoutils.vector3like.md) | The position in world coordinates. |
